author: TravisEz13
body:
MyGet registration fails intermittently.  We should try to make the CI system resilient to these failures.
```
Registering PSRepository with name: mygetpsmodule and sourcelocation: https://powershell.myget.org/F/powershellmodule/api/v2/
PowerShellGet\Register-PSRepository : The specified Uri 'https://powershell.myget.org/F/powershellmodule/api/v2/' for parameter 'SourceLocation' is an invalid Web Uri. Please ensure that it meets the Web Uri requirements.
At C:\projects\powershell\build.psm1:2219 char:9
+         PowerShellGet\Register-PSRepository -Name $RepositoryName -So ...
+         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidArgument: (https://powersh...lmodule/api/v2/:String) [Register-PSRepository], ArgumentException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : InvalidWebUri,Register-PSRepository
 
Failed to register repository 'mygetpsmodule'
```

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: We have not been experiencing these issues

title: make myget registration resilient to transient connection issues
